summary: Comprehensive testing of Facebook Group Lead Scraper housekeeping features. All requested features verified: cookie expiration awareness, single CSV per job, completionNotified flag for duplicate prevention. Backend APIs and frontend UI working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/scraper/cookies/status returns expiration info (valid, message, expiring_soon fields)
Backend: GET /api/scraper/industries returns list of 8 industries
Backend: GET /api/scrapes returns 16 CSV files with metadata (name, size, records, uploaded_at)
Backend: GET /api/scrapes/download/{filename} successfully downloads CSV files
Backend: GET /api/scraper/jobs returns job history with 23 completed jobs
Backend: POST /api/scraper/start validates URLs are provided (returns 400 for empty URLs)
Frontend: /scraper page loads with industry selector (8 industries), URL input, cookie settings
Frontend: /scraper shows cookie expiration warning (amber banner) - 'Cookies Expiring Soon: 3 cookies expiring soon'
Frontend: /scraper has all required data-testid attributes (urls-textarea, start-scraper-btn, cookie-input-textarea)
Frontend: /scrapes page loads with file listing (16 files), search functionality, download/delete buttons
Frontend: /scrapes search functionality works - filters files in real-time
Frontend: Navigation between /scraper and /scrapes works correctly
Code Review: fb_scraper.py stage2_deep_scrape does NOT have checkpoint save logic (verified lines 1032-1111)
Code Review: scrape_facebook_group saves single CSV file per job at end only (lines 612-635)
Code Review: ScraperDashboard.jsx completionNotified flag prevents duplicate toast notifications (lines 209, 230-231)
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: stage2_deep_scrape has NO checkpoint file saves - only final CSV saved in scrape_facebook_group
VERIFIED: completionNotified flag properly implemented to prevent duplicate 'scrape complete' notifications
VERIFIED: check_cookie_expiration returns valid, message, expiring_soon fields for frontend warning display
seed_data_creation: None needed - 16 CSV files and 23 jobs already exist in system
context_for_next_testing_agent: All housekeeping features verified working. Cookie expiration warnings showing correctly (3 cookies expiring soon). 16 CSV files in database, 23 completed jobs in history. The scraping mechanism itself was NOT tested per instructions - requires valid Facebook cookies and real browser session.
